product_name: Mountain Hardwear Desna Fleece Vest - Men's
long_description: The Mountain Hardwear Desna Fleece Vest for men is a lightweight, mid-layer vest designed to liberate your arms for enhanced mobility while keeping your core warm on chilly days. Polyester/spandex hardface fleece stretches, breathes and provides warmth. MicroClimate Zoning(TM) construction places warmth where you want it and ventilation where you need it. Dual hem cords let you make quick adjustments to seal warmth in, weather out. Mountain Hardwear Desna Fleece Vest for men offers zippered handwarmer pockets and 1 zippered chest pocket.
short_description: The Mountain Hardwear Desna Fleece Vest for men is a lightweight, mid-layer vest designed to liberate your arms for enhanced mobility while keeping your core warm on chilly days.
